response.overview: The VICE GUIDE TO TRAVEL is the first installment in VICE magazineâ€™s new DVD series. The series will feature short documentaries arranged around a different theme. For this edition we went to the kinds of places that nobody else wants to visit. We traveled to the corners of the world where news is happening, the forgotten locales where strange people and stories lie and where history is being made every day. This is the VICE idea of a vacation.
response.title: The Vice Guide to Travel
